content:
I and @Boris Yankov are deciding the best way to indicate starred message in the app here https://github.com/zulip/zulip-mobile/pull/434#issuecomment-292502474 .

1. One approach is to, like the web app UI show star on right of starred messages (Note that the star icon isn't tappable, the interaction being decided is to tap and hold to view an action sheet of sort and select "Star" to star a message)

1.png

This approach requires the starred messages to be narrowed in width.

2. Stars can also be shown on left hand side of messages, but if the first message in list is starred it conflicts with the position of user avatar and, I am not sure of this but can be interpreted as the user being starred.

2.png

3. Another approach is as @Boris Yankov suggested is to dimly highlight the starred message.
3.png

Any inputs are welcome :)
(Opened https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/4453 for the issue that the screenshots weren't sorted properly)
